channel.title: ScreenAutomationBot Pro Updates
channel.description: Most recent updates to ScreenAutomationBot Pro

item.title: Version 5.2 (Background Fix)
item.description:
Background Memorization Improvement (v5.2)

  • Multi-frame Averaging: Background capture now uses 10 frames to eliminate flickering and noise.
  • Color Filtering: Improved green filter to ignore white text and background objects.
  • Persistence: Setting for 'Background Tolerance' is now saved automatically.

item.title: Version 5.2
item.description:
Version 5.2 Changes

  • Fixed missing preview: OCR now continues to run for preview purposes even when "Stop" is pressed.
  • Actions (Keys/Recovery) are correctly guarded and will NOT execute while stopped.
